Help:Node.title: General Concepts: Discipline
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Dismiss
StoryGuides have the ability to send players to the Oubliette if they are being disruptive to the game. This is intended to be a merely temporary measure until an understanding can be reached which does not destroy everyone's enjoyment of the game.
Characters sent to the Oubliette are trapped and will not be able to leave.
(The Oubliette is intended solely for out-of-character (OOC) problems. In-character (IC) problems are dealth with by the Watchmen and guards and characters might be sent to the Dungeons for a few days.)
You may appeal a StoryGuide action by mailing ce@skotos.net.
